revised_title: Investigation of Arc and Spark Spectra in Vacuo and Helium for Various Elements
tldr: The authors conducted experiments on the vacuum arc spectra of various metals and the spark spectra in helium for several elements. They successfully expanded knowledge of the spectra for these elements, including antimony, bismuth, calcium, magnesium, copper, and silver, as well as the spark spectra of aluminum, antimony, bismuth, cadmium, calcium, lead, magnesium, thallium, and tin. The study used fluorite spectrograph and vacuum grating spectrograph for their research.
